item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

if (playerRights != 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
}

if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator "+playerName+" has logged in show some respect";
}

Try that
